Name: Sex Simulator 2020
About the game: Sex Simulator 2020 is a brand new experience! Now you can enjoy the sex constructor by modeling your own scenes. Feel like a porn director or his hero! Try yourself in the role of a real male or just a lover of sex. You can even imagine making your own porn movie! Several location options to choose from, over 400 frames of animation and the ability to place characters anywhere - will not let you get bored. The game also features several camera modes. The camera can be fixed for the characters, have free movement, or you can give control of the camera to the game itself in order to fully control in what poses the characters will have sex and where. But think it will be that simple? Your character (like all people in their first sex) doesn't know much about it! Gain experience and discover new poses! Key features: Over 400 frames of animation; Four locations with a unique setting; Three camera modes, each suitable for any player; The ability not only to have sex, but also to engage in foreplay; Good fun before jerking off;
